list_definition.definition: an edible shellfish that has a pair of hinged, fan-shaped shells.

list_ex_of_english: The beds will be closed to fishing, if necessary, to prevent the overfishing of the scallops.

He referred to the landings of scallop over the last year.
The same care is needed, therefore, with dissection and removal of a large aortic scallop.
There are many other fish, including a small catch of scallops.
These demarcate the so-called "scallops", or commissural leaflets.
Either removal of a large scallop or further dissection is necessary in these circumstances.
I am informed that an air review is made weekly of the number of boats fishing for scallops.
